characters.name: Takaki Tohno
characters.description: Takaki is the protagonist of the film. He and Akari are close friends, but begin to drift apart when Akari moves away and they end up attending different junior high schools. They continue to write to one another until Takaki discovers he must move to Tanegashima. The two decide to meet one snowy day, perhaps for the last time...   In high school, he belonged to the kyudo club.  (Source: Wikipedia)

characters.name: Akari Shinohara
characters.description: Takaki's best friend in elementary school. She wanted to go to the same junior high school as Takaki, but because of her parents' jobs, she had to move to Tochigi after graduating from elementary school. She and Takaki keep in touch with letters.    ~!Later on due their distance and time apart from each other, these letters ceased to be exchanged.!~  (Source: Wikipedia)

characters.name: Kanae Sumida
characters.description: A classmate of Takaki in high school. She has been in love with Takaki since he began attending her junior high school, but cannot express her feelings to him. Kanae loves to surf and rides a scooter to school. Her older sister is a teacher at her high school.  (Source: Wikipedia)

characters.name: Risa Mizuno
characters.description:
Risa Mizuno is a girl Takaki met in Tokyo. They met a couple of times due to their work and started going out after a while.

In the movie, Risa and Takaki were together for a while and Risa started sending text messages to him, inviting him to hang out, but Takaki did not reply back since he still has feelings for Akari.

~!When Akari moved on and got married, Takaki tried to move on and started dating Risa Mizuno, but eventually broke up.!~

~!Risa's background story is explored in more depth in the manga and light novel. Apparently, she and Takaki were dating for more than four years. They went on several trips and dates together; but besides her attempts to move forward with their relationship, they stayed the same. This becomes explicit when she invites Takaki to meet her parents and he turns her down. He would use excuses, but she thinks he was avoiding her because she tried to rush their relationship. Later on, Takaki admits that he had commitment issues due to his past since he really believed someday he would be together with Akari again, so he couldn't truly love anybody else. Afterward, Risa decides to break up with him and move on with her life.

In chapter 9, after breaking up with him, she says, "I hope we meet again, in some new way, as new people, and that something new starts."!~

(Source: xbobx, AkatsukiUlquiora; MAL)

characters.name: Akari no Chichi
characters.description: He was born in Iwafune. After marrried, he and his wife gave birth to their only child in Uchinomiya. He's been working for a regional electronics manufacturer based in Tochigi. Due to the nature of his job, their family had to constantly change their workplace once a few years. He used to work in Shizuoka before transfered to Tokyo.

characters.name: Akari no Haha
characters.description: After marrried, she gave birth to the only child in Uchinomiya. Due to the nature of her husband's job, their family had to constantly change their workplace once a few years. They used to live in Shizuoka before moved to Tokyo.

characters.name: Yuichi
characters.description: Yuichi (祐一, Yūichi) is a minor character in 5 Centimeters per Second. He is Akari Shinohara's fiance. His fiancée describes him as someone tolerant and generous, and won't mind if she thinks about her childhood crush.

characters.name: Chobi
characters.description: The cat that belongs to the woman in the story. Also takes the role of the narrator. Has a girlfriend (cat) called Mimi. Seems to have feelings for the female (human) though.
